tool.name: OTB.Rescale
tool.description: Rescale the image between two given values.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.Rescale in $in out $out ram $ram outmin $outmin outmax $outmax prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: in
param.label: The image to scale.
param.help: The image to scale. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: jpeg, tiff, png

param.name: outmin
param.label: Minimum value of the output image.
param.help: Minimum value of the output image.

param.name: outmax
param.label: Maximum value of the output image.
param.help: Maximum value of the output image.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: This application scales the given image pixel intensity between two given values.By default min (resp. max) value is set to 0 (resp. 255).Input minimum and maximum values is automatically computed for all image bands.
